# Prismeek - Web Design Company India

> Award-winning web design and development agency based in Bangalore, India. We create stunning websites, mobile apps, AI chatbots, and digital experiences for businesses worldwide.

## About Prismeek

Prismeek is a premium digital agency founded by Debjit Dey. We specialize in:
- Web Design & Development
- Mobile App Development (iOS, Android, React Native)
- AI & Chatbot Integration (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini)
- UI/UX Design
- SaaS Development
- Brand Identity & Strategy

## Services

### Web Platforms
High-performance websites including corporate sites, e-commerce platforms, WebGL/3D experiences, and headless CMS development.

### Mobile Ecosystems
iOS and Android native apps, React Native cross-platform development, and mobile UI/UX design.

### AI Concierge
LLM integration with ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini. Workflow automation, predictive analytics, and AI consulting.

### Brand Identity
Visual identity systems, rebranding, art direction, and motion graphics.

### Software Engineering
Enterprise SaaS architecture, cloud infrastructure, custom API integrations.

## Pricing

- **The Essential:** From ₹60,000 - Visual Identity, Web Development, Mobile Optimization, Basic SEO
- **The Signature:** From ₹1,50,000 - Brand Strategy, Full-Stack Web App, CMS, Content, Marketing
- **The Heritage:** Custom Pricing - Global Brand Architecture, AI Integration, 3D Design, App Development

## Technologies We Use

React, Next.js, Node.js, Three.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS, Vercel, OpenAI, Anthropic Claude

## Industries We Serve

- E-Commerce & Retail
- Hospitality & Travel
- Fintech & Banking
- Real Estate
- SaaS & Technology
- Healthcare
- Education

## Areas Served

India (Bangalore, Mumbai, Delhi, Hyderabad, Chennai, Pune), United States, United Kingdom, Canada, Australia, UAE, Dubai, Singapore, Germany, and Worldwide.
